sections.title: Description
sections.raw_content: The Text.WhatColor function is used to determine the current text (foreground) color, ie., the color used for characters that are output using put. The alternate spelling is Text.WhatColour.
sections.text_content: The Text.WhatColor function is used to determine the current text (foreground) color, ie., the color used for characters that are output using put. The alternate spelling is Text.WhatColour.
sections.mdown_content: The **Text.WhatColor** function is used to** **determine the current text (foreground) color, ie., the color used for characters that are output using **put**. The alternate spelling is **Text.WhatColour**.

sections.title: Details
sections.raw_content: The screen should be in a "screen" or "graphics" mode. See View.Set for details.
sections.text_content: The screen should be in a "screen" or "graphics" mode. See View.Set for details.
sections.mdown_content: The screen should be in a "_screen_"_ _or "_graphics_" mode. See **View.Set **for details.

sections.title: Status
